mapper.insert: insert into board(userid, title, content, category, thumbnailImg, img1, img2, img3) value(#{userid},#{title},#{content}, #{category}, #{thumbnailImg}, #{img1}, #{img2}, #{img3})
mapper.select: select title, date_format(createdate, "%m/%d %H:%i")createdate, thumbnailImg, pick, views, price from board where category=#{param1} order by no desc
select category from board where category=#{param1} limit 1
